entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2003/8. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba

entry.dcterms:description: 1) evaluation of the work of the government and opposition, subjective financial situation, evaluating the economic situation of Hungary 2) party preferences, popularity of politicians 3) the populations' inflationary expectations 4) public opinion about the economic competition 5) public opinion about the topics in the television news 6) Attitudes towards the speed-limit
entry.dcterms:subject: consumption/consumer behavior
economic systems and development
income, property and savings
mass political behavior, attitudes
social behaviour and attitudes
mass media
transport, travel (and mobility)
economic conditions and indicators
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the random walking method out of each strata. Numbers of selected persons are proportional to strata's size
face-to-face interview
A
